dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The Prime Minister of Slovakia, Robert Fico, was just received with full ceremony at the Akorda residence in Astana.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Prime Minister of Slovakia, Robert Fico, was just received with full ceremony at the Akorda residence in Astana.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Prime Minister of Slovakia was received with honors in Astana, according to Akorda. A ceremonial welcome for Slovak Prime Minister Robert Fico, who arrived in Astana on an official visit, took place at the Akorda residence.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and that's the presidential palace in Kazakhstan. It's not just a building, it's a whole statement.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and that's the presidential palace in Kazakhstan. It's not just a building, it's a whole statement.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. They had the honor guard company commander deliver a welcome report, which is, like, this very specific military tradition.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The commander of the honor guard company delivered a welcome report, followed by the national anthems of Kazakhstan and Slovakia," the Akorda statement said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And then the national anthems of both countries. That moment is always so loaded with symbolism, you know?

dialogue_turns.text: Totally. It's about mutual respect on a national level before they even sit down to talk business.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And the business here is expanding the Kazakh-Slovak partnership. I'm curious what sectors they're focusing on.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Probably energy, infrastructure... Slovakia has a lot of industrial expertise, and Kazakhstan has massive natural resources.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Probably energy, infrastructure... Slovakia has a lot of industrial expertise, and Kazakhstan has massive natural resources.

dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it's interesting 'cause these are two countries that don't always make headlines together, but there's real potential there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev hosting him personally shows how seriously they're taking it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: These visits lay the groundwork for, like, years of cooperation. It's not just a one-off thing.
